mapper.select: SELECT op.orders_detail_tb_no, op.pd_sale_tb_no, op.orders_detail_tb_amount, op.pd_order_tb_no, op.orders_detail_tb_price, op.pd_sale_tb_product_name, pi.pd_image_tb_path FROM pd_image pi, (SELECT od.orders_detail_tb_no, od.pd_sale_tb_no, od.orders_detail_tb_amount, od.pd_order_tb_no, od.orders_detail_tb_price, ps.product_tb_code, ps.pd_sale_tb_product_name FROM pd_sale ps, orders_detail od, pd_order pd WHERE ps.pd_sale_tb_no = od.pd_sale_tb_no AND od.pd_order_tb_no = #{pdOrderTbNo} AND pd.pd_order_tb_no = #{pdOrderTbNo}) op WHERE pi.product_tb_code = op.product_tb_code AND pi.pd_image_tb_representative = 'Y' ORDER BY op.orders_detail_tb_no
